version_description: - minor bug fixes

- iOS设备支持10
- 新卫星：SDO，SMAP，贾森 - 3，KMS-4，SWIFT，野山羊
- 新的任务：晓，凤凰城，先锋12，先锋13，旅居者
- 一些错误修复
- Bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

Dearest Stargazer,

We'd like to thank you for being our loyal user. You've seen lots of updates lately. We do our best to give you the flawless experience with our app.

This update brings you Space Cartoons that are popular among both kids and adults. The animated films cover most of the objects of the Solar System like Sun, Earth, Pluto and others.

Please leave your reviews and ratings in AppStore they are priceless for us.

Clear skies and lots of love,
Star Walk Team.

Dearest Stargazers,

We’d like to introduce you to our newest bright icon and hope you’ll love it as much as we do. Please leave your comments in reviews and let us know what you think!

We’ve fixed the bug connected with Leo constellation and want to thank our users who pointed out the problem.

The Japanese localizations have been fixed as well.

We’ve noticed that most of you like sharing your sky thus we added the functionality of sharing to the Augmented Reality view in the upper left corner of the screen. We look forward to the pictures of the sky you see above you and hope you share it via social networks of your choice. Let your friends know what’s up! 

We’ll be very thankful for spreading the word about our spectaculous app for stargazing!

Clear sky and lots of love.
Star Walk Team.

+ Fixed Digital Compass on new iPad Pro devices
+ Bug fixes & improvements

- Added “What’s new” section
- Added “Turn off object captions” feature
- Bug fixes
+Fixed bug with Apple Watch app
Minor bug fixes

+NEW! iPhoneX support! The app is updated for the new device and can be used safely
+Improved Star Spotter that lets you tag the stars in the sky
+Minor bug fixes connected with the work of the camera in AR
+Fixed models of few missions
+Fixed minor bugs

+The functionality of Time Machine has been drastically improved it’s become easier to jump to the desired date in the past or future to see the night sky then.
+Added the ability to set the exact coordinates. This makes the night sky map more precise as you can stargaze far away from the cities thus you can enter the coordinates instead of the nearest big city or current location.
+Improved onboarding instructions to introduce new users to the apps’ main features.
+Tune in star brightness while stargazing: switch off the stars that are not visible from your location to make the sky less crowded and make it easier to identify objects in the night sky.
+The search enhancements: the search has become more flexible.
+Added names of stars in constellations 3D view
+The NEW way to sort out stars according to the radius, distance, visual magnitude. Hundred thousands of stars are now easy to find according to their properties: the brightest, the biggest, the farthest.
+UI improvements connected with new fonts & colors.
+Multiple Bug fixes

Dearest Stargazer,
We’re excited to let you know about the major update of Star Walk 2 app. We’re glad to have you onboard.
+ Updated with the ARKit that allows you to experience the latest AR technology for stargazing
+ Added moons of the major planets of our Solar System (identify in the sky, read info, available via search)
+ Added space missions to the search catalogue
+ Added ExoMars and Chandra space missions
+ Added Tesla Roadster with the updated orbit
+ Added Oumuamua, the first interstellar visitor of unusual form
+ New default models for dwarfs and asteroids
+ Auto restore of In-App Purchases
+ Fixed model for XMM-Newton mission
+ Fixed default model for satellites
+ Bug fixes

Keep looking up to enjoy the sky!
Team Star Walk.

• Manage notifications about astronomical events in a new way:

- Сhoose when to receive notifications (5/15/30/60/120 minutes before the event starts).
- Receive notifications only when you want (choose a period of time during which you will not be disturbed).

• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Happy Stargazing!
Your reviews on the App Store are always welcome.

+ Bug fixes (including the problem with the Moon’s position).
+ Minor user interface changes.

Thank you for using Star Walk 2 Ads+!

Your feedback is always appreciated.

Thank you for using Star Walk 2 Ads+! This version brings the following enhancements:
+ Added the Telrad feature
+ Improved local notifications
+ Added the ability to calibrate compass manually
+ Improved the visualization of the comet tails
+ Fixed the position of Comet Heinze (C/2017 T1)
+ Fixed crashes on app launch

Happy hunting!

This version brings the following enhancements:

+ Fixed and improved in-app purchase restoring
+ Added option not to show the constellations of Avengers in the sky
+ Optimized data update

Have a good time exploring the mysteries of the night sky with Star Walk 2 Ads+!

Contact us at support@vitotechnology.com if you have any questions, comments or suggestions.
Your feedback is always welcomed.

Fixed:
• bugs that caused freezing and crashing of the app
• some inaccuracies in the positions of comets and asteroids
• positions of celestial objects in the distant past and in the future

Updated:
• information about some of the objects

Dear Astronomy Lovers!
To make Star Walk 2 Ads+ better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. The latest version of the app includes performance improvements and minor bug fixes. 

Thank you for staying with us. Any feedback is always appreciated.
Happy stargazing!

+ Fixed bugs that caused freezing and crashing of the app.
+ User interface optimization.
+ Performance improvements and other enhancements. 

For questions, remarks or suggestions: support@vitotechnology.com
Your feedback is highly appreciated.

- Based on your feedback, we’ve added translations of our astronomical news.
- New for iOS 12: use Siri Shortcuts to see what’s up in your sky quicker than ever. Create shortcuts and get a list of astronomical events for your location at any time without opening the app.
- Check out our new “Visible Tonight” section and be aware of the most interesting space sightings visible in your sky.
- Full support for the newest Apple devices.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Don't hesitate to reach us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments, or suggestions.
As always, your ratings and reviews on the App Store are very welcome.

Make the most of your stargazing experience with Star Walk 2 Ads+!

● Based on your feedback, we’ve added translations of our Astronomical news.
● New for iOS 12: use Siri Shortcuts to see what’s up in your sky quicker than ever. Create shortcuts and get a list of astronomical events for your location at any time without opening the app.
● Check out our new “Visible Tonight” section and be aware of the most interesting space sightings visible in your sky.
● Full support for the newest Apple devices.
● Minor bug fixes and performance improvements, of course.

Don't hesitate to reach us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments, or suggestions. 

As always, your ratings and reviews on the App Store are very welcome.

Don't hesitate to reach us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments, or suggestions.
As always, your ratings and reviews on the App Store are very welcome.

Make the most of your stargazing experience with Star Walk 2 Ads+!

Merry Christmas & Happy New Year!

Enjoy this festive season with Star Walk 2 Ads+. We've updated our astronomical calendar with celestial events for the year 2019 and invited cute Santa Claus to the app to brighten up your holidays.

Wishing you good health, happiness, and success in the coming year and always. 

Yours truly,
Vito Technology Team.

Star Walk 2 Ads+ is ready for iOS 13 and the Dark Mode!

With a new design, the app becomes even more beautiful and engaging. Please check it and tell us what you think.

In this version:

● Added some additional info about the current position of the objects in the search menu.

● Fixed some localization errors, bugs in ‘SkyLive’, problems with notification settings and other minor bugs of the app.

Enjoy exploring the mysteries of the night sky with Star Walk 2 Ads+!

Contact us at support@vitotechnology.com if you have any questions, comments or suggestions. Your feedback and reviews on the App Store are always welcome.

Fixed:

● Bugs with the ‘What’s new’ and ‘Visible tonight’ sections.
● Problems with loading satellites in the search menu.
● A black screen when opening the app.
● Some localization errors and errors in the ‘SkyLive’ section.
● Problems with notification settings.
● Other minor bugs of the app.

If you still experience any of these or other problems, please let us know about them at support@vitotechnology.com. 

Enjoy exploring the mysteries of the night sky with Star Walk 2 Ads+!

Your feedback and reviews on the App Store are always welcome.

Star Walk 2 Ads+ has changed for Christmas. Enjoy the sky this festive season and meet Santa Claus in the app!

Wishing you a peaceful Christmas and Happy New Year.

Yours truly,
Vito Technology Team.

+ Fixed problem with the inner structure of objects
+ Fixed bug with the moon phases in the ‘Sky Live’ section

+ Fixed crashing issues
+ Other minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Enjoy the app? Rate us and share your feedback.

+ Comet C/2020 F8 (SWAN) position accuracy improved.

Enjoy the app? Rate us and share your feedback.

+ Added Starlink satellite model.
+ Models of several asteroids and comets updated and improved.
+ Added new complications for Apple Watch 4 and Apple Watch 5.
+ The 'Star Spotter' feature significantly improved.
+ Added manual calibration for devices without digital compass.
+ Added the ability to change the time in the ‘Visible Tonight’ section.
 
Fixed:
 
- User Interface fixes and enhancements.
- Fixed bug with crash on Apple Watch.
- Small localization fixes.
 
We update Star Walk 2 Ads+ regularly to make it better for you. If you like the app, please take a moment to rate us on the App Store and leave a review. Your feedback is highly appreciated. 
 
Feel free to contact us at support@vitotechnology.com with any questions, comments or suggestions.

Happy stargazing!

Updated for iOS14 - WIDGETS!
Put the key stargazing information on the Home screen and get easy access to up-to-date astronomical content.
